newsitem.title: USA: Bowlin Outdoor names H. Eric Peitz as CFO.
newsitem.headline: Bowlin Outdoor names H. Eric Peitz as CFO.

text.p: BOWLIN Outdoor Advertising & Travel Centers Inc said Tuesday that it has named H. Eric Peitz as its chief financial officer.
He replaces Michael Rising, said BOWLIN, who resigned to become CFO with Blue Sky Natural Beverage Co in Santa Fe, New Mexico.

Prior to joining BOWLIN, the company said Peitz served with an international firm in South America where he represented North American manufacturers in strategic alliance negotiations. In this capacity, said BOWLIN, he also designed feasibility studies for entering new markets.
